page.title: 01INTRO. TO BUCKHURST HILL
page.content: This block is divided into three residential areas : Buckhurst Hill,Chigwell and Woodford. These areas are very similar.They are middle-class suburbs of London.Because of this similarity we use the name Buckhurst Hill to cover the whole area.Hence,the title Police In Buckhurst Hill refers to police in all of the block. Physically, the block is divided in two by the R. Roding running north to south.To the west of the river is mostly wasteland except for Chigwell.It is the area to the east which is of most interest.Here are most of the shops and small industry.(There is no heavy industry in this area).The eastern half of the block is nearly all housing apart from patches of Forest land.
